mapper.select: SELECT p.plan_id, p.plan_title, p.start_date, p.create_by, p.item_count, p.is_delete, p.delete_at, p.create_at, p.is_public, pi.plan_item_idx as item_plan_item_idx, pi.content_id as item_content_id, pi.plan_id as item_plan_id, pi.memo as item_memo, pi.order as item_order FROM plan p LEFT JOIN plan_item pi ON p.plan_id = pi.content_id WHERE p.plan_id = #{planId}

SELECT p.plan_id, p.plan_title, p.start_date, p.create_by, p.item_count, p.is_delete, p.delete_at, p.create_at, p.is_public, pi.plan_item_idx as item_plan_item_idx, pi.content_id as item_content_id, pi.plan_id as item_plan_id, pi.memo as item_memo, pi.order as item_order FROM plan p LEFT JOIN plan_item pi ON p.plan_id = pi.content_id WHERE p.plan_id = #{planId}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO plan ( plan_title, start_date, create_by, item_count, is_delete, delete_at, create_at, is_public) VALUES ( #{planTitle}, #{startDate}, #{createBy}, #{itemCount}, #{isDelete}, #{deleteAt}, #{createAt}, #{isPublic})
INSERT INTO plan_item ( content_id, plan_id, memo, order) VALUES ( #{contentId}, #{planId}, #{memo}, #{order})
